author: jalkanen
msg: Fixed the failing unit tests for PageRenamer.  The problem was caused by the wrong order in the renaming; the attachments were asked for *after* the page had been moved, so the references were never ok.
Also, self-references were not counted by ReferenceManager.  This was probably some old leftover code; so added a new test and modified some old ones to make sure everything is accounted for.
